content: pattern is also available as a pdf here 1 available as a kit with yarn at craftsy here 2 **please pay attention to the following pattern note ** *when the pattern directs you to work in a v-st insert your hook in the space beneath the chain-1 of the v-st be careful not to work in either the double_crochet before or after the chain-1 space unless otherwise directed as together the double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet all counts as one v-st ** careful attention to what double_crochet is part of a v-st and what is a true double_crochet will help you in the rounds of the crown if you like mark the double_crochet that are not part of a v-st you ll be working those when instructed to work in double_crochet also a tiny errata round 2 should say all this part correct repeat from star around 2 double_crochet in same **single_crochet** as beg chain-3 rest is correct >whether you re a crochet-curious knitter or a seasoned hooker you ll love the results of this quick and easy pattern it includes four sizes from baby to adult so you can make one for each of the sisters in your life 1 https //www craftsy com/pattern/crocheting/accessory/little-sister-hat/34620 2 http //www craftsy com/supplies/little-sister-hat/4183
